## Floral & Fruity
Blending together Pommard and 113 clones from the Chehalem Mountains Parrett Mountain region, we created this enchanting Pinot Noir. It will conjure walking through a Rose garden on the nose while it bursts with fruit on the palette. While fruity, this Pinot still holds its structure nicely with well-balanced tannins. ALC/VOL 14.3%
$49.00
[All wines are currently available  
for in-person sales only.
